gov.nasa.arc.mct.policy
Class PolicyContext

java.lang.Object
  gov.nasa.arc.mct.policy.PolicyContext

public final class PolicyContext
extends java.lang.Object

Defines the context for policy execution. A PolicyContext contains a property list that maps a property name to an Object.

          Defines the property list for the PolicyContext.
